content.rendered:
Inflating tyres with Indeflate:

Deflating tyres with Indeflate:

  • MAXTRAX presents the INDEFLATE, a device that is used to inflate or deflate two tyres simeltaneously, and equalises the pressure between the two automatically.
  • Inflating and deflating tyres can really be a tedious process. The task of deflating tyres one-by-one, without knowing exactly what your tyre pressure is, is made into a quick and simple task with INDEFLATE.
  • The MAXTRAX INDEFLATE attaches to two points (2 tyres) at once, equalising automatically, and has a unique dump valve system that allows you to deflate two tyres at once.
  • Using the MAXTRAX INDEFLATE you can attach a compressor and inflate two tyres, equally, at once.
  • MAXTRAX INDEFLATE has a built in pressure gauge, which means that you can monintor your tyre pressure while inflating, deflating, or simply equalising.
  • MAXTRAX INDEFLATE is made from highly durable precision engineering aluminium and comes with two 3m highly flexible air hoses that are abrasion and ozone resistant.
  • Clip on chucks make it simple and safe to connect to tyre valves.
  • MAXTRAX INDEFLATE comes in a strong and durable carry bag to make it convenient to carry and store.

excerpt.rendered: MAXTRAX Indeflate
